entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15 except minus 20 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 15 except minus 20 inland. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023
